step1.title: These are the available collections
step1.hint: Remember that you can choose more than one collection per category, and collections from several categories at the same time.

step2.title: These are the available fields
step2.hint: Remember that you can choose more than one field per collection, and fields from several collections at the same time.
step2.uri: This field can be used to link the collection with another one
step2.empty: At least one collection must be chosen in the previous step.

step3.title: Link selected collections
step3.hint: To obtain more interesting results you can link selected collections.

step4.title: Filter the collections contents
step4.hint: To remove uninteresting results you can create filters for the selected fields.

step5.title: Visualize the results
step5.hint: Remember that each chart type has its own parameters.
step5.sizeLabel: Space reserved for labels in pixels
step5.detailRes: Temporal resolution of the details band
step5.overviewRes: Temporal resolution of the overview band
step5.empty: At least one collection and one field must be chosen in the previous steps.
